data.title: C Site Execute Boom Bot + Paint Shells
data.description: Use this Boom Bot + Paint Shells to entry on to C Site.

data.title: B Main Execute Boom Bot Lineup into B Site
data.description: Use this Boom Bot lineup to execute onto B Site through with your team.

data.title: A Link Door to B Site Boom Bot Lineup
data.description: Use this Boom Bot lineup to make it easier for your team to push through the A Link Door into B Site, without being punished by enemy players holding a close angle.
